name: Vortex
description: Vortex is a retro styled physics driven local multiplayer top down shooter where the goal is to fly around in neat looking spaceships and kill your opponents by making their lives miserable.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 x64 or higher Processor: Quad Core 2.5 gHz or faster Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: this game COULD be fun, but i will never know ... it's in my library but i cannot play it ...  it's a multiplayer game, but it doesn't support online multiplayer; it's a couch-sharing multiplayer game, without possibility to run bots or whatsoever; you just can't try the game by yourself...  so that brings me to my conclusion;... this game is NOT GOOD. The multiplayer part is bad too because it's lacking basic functions like a serverbrowser... the game is just not finished; it's a demo for something that might be a cool multiplayer game...
